toolbar.signInBonus: Sign in and register profile for

storage.localStorageDescription: This area is saved to local HDD, SSD, etc.
storage.cloudStorageDescription: Save data to the cloud. This feature is in beta. Service may be discontinued without notice. Available with BASIC plan.
storage.selectFolderDescription: Select a folder to save data. If the previously selected folder is not visible, select the same location again to restore it.
storage.unlinkStorageMessage: Unlink the save folder?\nâ€»After unlinking, you can reuse it by selecting the same location again

fileManager.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
fileManager.moveByDragEditByDoubleClick: Drag to move, double-click to edit
fileManager.registeredBubbleTemplate:
Bubble template registered
Can be used like shapes
fileManager.lastAccessFileIsCloud:
Last accessed file is a cloud file,
waiting for cloud storage connection
fileManager.cloudConnectionFailed: Failed to connect to cloud storage
fileManager.cloudFileLoadingMessage:
Loading cloud files may
take some time
fileManager.localStorageConnectionFailed: Failed to connect to local storage. Please reconnect.
fileManager.cloudFileCannotOpenDirectly:
Cloud files cannot be opened directly
Please copy to local first
fileManager.folderSpecificationDescription: Create a FramePlanner storage database on an OS (Windows, Mac, etc.) folder.
fileManager.selectEmptyFolder: Select an empty folder to save the storage database.
fileManager.reuseExistingDatabase: If you select a folder with an existing database, initialization will be skipped and it will be used as before.
fileManager.initializationDescription: Database not found in the specified folder, initialization will be performed.
fileManager.initializationWarning: This operation will delete the contents of the folder. This operation cannot be canceled. If you wanted to connect an existing database, please carefully check if you have specified the wrong hierarchy.
fileManager.completeDescription: Preparation is complete. Press "Complete" to set the new storage database as the default desktop/cabinet area.

messages.dataLossWarning: This area may be lost due to browser "Clear Site Data" operations. Please backup important files to "Local Storage" or "Cloud Storage".
messages.localStorageNotAvailable: Local storage is not available in this environment
messages.aiSignInRequired: Sign-in required to use AI features
messages.memoryInsufficient: Insufficient storage space. Please free up space and take measures such as creating a dump. If left unattended, all FramePlanner data may be lost.

tooltips.newDocumentHint:
New Document
Drop image for single image document
Ctrl+Click to paste image

dump.title: Data Export
dump.description:
Export FramePlanner data to an external file.
This file can be used to restore data in other environments.
dump.warning: Note: This process may take some time.

undump.title: Data Restore
undump.description: Restore data from a previously exported FramePlanner dump file.
undump.warning: Warning: Current data will be completely replaced. This operation cannot be undone.
undump.storageWarning: Please be careful about the remaining local storage capacity. If storage capacity is insufficient, the restore may fail.
